titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the terms of office for Members of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 6/30/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Limits a Representative to six and one-half terms and a Senator to two and one-half terms. Allows a person holding office on the adoption of this amendment to complete his or her term.
